pages.title: Effects
pages.text: Effects are what makes totems do stuff. Active and passive totems both have their own set of effects. Effects can be potion effects or other things like exposions or a spawn teleport.$(br2)Like activators, effects all have a unique crafting ingredient. Unlike activators, effects can also be upgraded. To upgrade an effect, you need to keep combining

the totem with it's ingredient. For example for the strength effect, you need to combine an active totem with a blaze powder. The totem will than have strength I. To upgrade it to strength II you need to keep combining it with blaze powder untill you have added 16 more.
